plugins.name: Outset Pr Invoice Plugin
plugins.description:
Invoice Filler Plugin for Outset PR


This plugin is specifically designed for Outset PR and works exclusively with their internal invoice template in Figma. It automates the process of populating the template with data submitted via the plugin’s form, streamlining the invoicing workflow for the company.


How It Works:


The plugin is built to integrate with a single invoice template used by Outset PR.

Users submit invoice data through the plugin's form.

The plugin then automatically fills the predefined fields in the Outset PR invoice template within Figma.


Limitation for Reviewers:


Since the plugin is tailored for Outset PR's proprietary invoice template, reviewers will not have access to the template for testing.


For Figma Reviewers:


To review the functionality of the plugin, please use mock data in the form. The plugin will generate a dummy page with the entered data displayed.

If you are a member of the Figma team, please fill out the form and review the data generated by the plugin to understand its intended functionality.


Key Features:


Specifically designed for Outset PR’s invoice template, allowing users to quickly populate the template with the required data.

Simplifies the invoicing process for Outset PR by eliminating manual data entry.

Optimized for seamless integration with a single internal template used by the company.
plugins.tagline: A plugin to fill invoices

plugins.name: Diopter
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you see how you are using remote components for linked and unlinked libraries. For example, you can find mobile components in a file with only desktop explorations. With a tool like this, you can being spring cleaning now and get your files squeaky clean.


To use this plugin, you'll need to create a personal access token with read-only access to files. I needed that token to be able to get details about file libraries—e.g., library name. The first time you run the plugin, you'll be asked to paste the token.
plugins.tagline: Clearly see which components you're using and where they come from.

127509.name: Diopter
127509.description:
This plugin helps you see how you are using remote components for linked and unlinked libraries. For example, you can find mobile components in a file with only desktop explorations. With a tool like this, you can being spring cleaning now and get your files squeaky clean.


To use this plugin, you'll need to create a personal access token with read-only access to files. I needed that token to be able to get details about file libraries—e.g., library name. The first time you run the plugin, you'll be asked to paste the token.
127509.release_notes: Adds a way to find frames that used to be components.
127509.tagline: Clearly see which components you're using and where they come from.

plugins.name: QD - Magix - AI Text Generator
plugins.description:
Magix - AI Text Generator enables seamless text creation for your designs using OpenAI’s API.


After connecting the API, simply select the text elements (Text objects, Sticky notes or Shapes with text) you wish to generate. The plugin will automatically list them, allowing you to input custom prompts. With a single click on ‘Generate Content’ all selected text elements will be instantly generated and integrated into your design, streamlining your workflow.


AI Makes It Simple...
plugins.tagline: AI-Powered Text Generation - All Texts with One Click

122756.name: QD - Magix - AI Text Generator
122756.description:
Magix - AI Text Generator enables seamless text creation for your designs using OpenAI’s API.


After connecting the API, simply select the text elements (Text objects, Sticky notes or Shapes with text) you wish to generate. The plugin will automatically list them, allowing you to input custom prompts. With a single click on ‘Generate Content’ all selected text elements will be instantly generated and integrated into your design, streamlining your workflow.


AI Makes It Simple...

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires access to the OpenAI API to generate text. and moeinsaboohi to load header image.

122756.release_notes:
I’m constantly working to improve Magix for a better experience. If you have any suggestions or encounter any issues, feel free to share them! 😊

Version 3 Release Notes:
•  Improved UI and UX for a smoother experience
•  Fixed plugin issues in FigJam
•  Added text generation support for sticky notes and text-based shapes
•  Enhanced state message display
•  Resolved reported bugs
122756.tagline: AI-Powered Text Generation - All Texts with One Click

plugins.name: Scribe Guard - AI-powered Writing System Validator
plugins.description:
🎯 What is it?

A powerful AI tool that analyzes your text content against your writing system guidelines, ensuring perfect brand consistency and tone of voice alignment.


✨ Key Features

  1. AI-powered content analysis
  2. Writing system validation
  3. Style guide compliance checks
  4. Tone of voice verification
  5. Terminology consistency
  6. Real-time feedback


🚀 How to Use

  1. Upload your Writing System PDF
  2. Enter your ChatGPT API key
  3. Click "Analyze Copy"
  4. Review the detailed analysis


🛠️ What You'll Need

  1. ChatGPT API key
  2. Your writing system guidelines in PDF


🔒 Security Note

Your API key is handled securely and can be saved locally for convenience. All communications are encrypted and only happen through authorized channels.



The tool provides detailed feedback on tone, terminology, and style compliance, helping you maintain perfect brand consistency across all your content. No more manual checking - let AI do the heavy lifting! ✨
plugins.tagline: Validate your text content against writing system guidelines with AI-powered analysis

plugins.name: Template Manager
plugins.description:
Figma Template Saver


Description:

Effortlessly save and reuse entire Figma designs as templates while preserving frames, text, vectors, components, and precise positioning. This plugin ensures that every detail—fills, strokes, corner radius, and vector data—is accurately stored and replicated when applied to new files.


🔹 **Save any selection as a reusable template**

🔹 **Apply templates across different files with full fidelity**

🔹 **Preserve component instances, nested frames, vectors, and typography**

🔹 **Avoid missing fills or strokes with advanced capture logic**


Streamline your workflow and bring consistency to your designs—save once, apply anywhere! 🚀
plugins.tagline: **"Effortlessly save, reuse, and replicate Figma designs—preserve every detail with precision."**

plugins.name: K Translation
plugins.description:
K Translation is a localization tool designed to simplify the process of translating your Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files.


After installing the plugin, the user uploads an XLIFF file containing translations. The plugin analyzes the file, determines the source language, and lists available target languages.


The user then selects which languages to translate the frame into. To begin the translation, simply select a frame in Figma that contains text elements.


Once the "Create copy" button is pressed, the plugin automatically scans all the text within the frame and creates copies of the frame for each selected target language, effectively localizing your design with just a few click.
plugins.tagline: K Translation: localize Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files in just a few clicks.

103740.name: K Translation
103740.description:
K Translation is a localization tool designed to simplify the process of translating your Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files.


After installing the plugin, the user uploads an XLIFF file containing translations. The plugin analyzes the file, determines the source language, and lists available target languages.


The user then selects which languages to translate the frame into. To begin the translation, simply select a frame in Figma that contains text elements.


Once the "Create copy" button is pressed, the plugin automatically scans all the text within the frame and creates copies of the frame for each selected target language, effectively localizing your design with just a few click.
103740.release_notes: Added the ability to download a file containing texts that were not translated.
103740.tagline: K Translation: localize Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files in just a few clicks.

plugins.name: comodo exporter
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you rename and export layers named $IMG in your Figma project based on special tags. You can choose between two workflows:

  1. Destructive export: Layers are renamed and export settings applied (JPG, PNG, SVG, @1x, @2x, @3x). Once renamed, the original $IMG layers are lost, and the plugin cannot be rerun unless you revert to an earlier version.
  2. Non-destructive export: The plugin creates a new page where it duplicates and renames all matching layers, preserving the original ones. You can delete the new page and restart anytime.

A Figma template will soon be provided with pre-set tags and an organized layout to make your workflow faster and more reliable. More detailed documentation will also follow.
plugins.tagline: Rename & export $IMG layers via tags. Template & docs coming soon for easy setup.

134292.name: comodo exporter
134292.description:

  2. Non-destructive export: The plugin creates a new page where it duplicates and renames all matching layers, preserving the original ones. You can delete the new page and restart anytime.

A Figma template will soon be provided with pre-set tags and an organized layout to make your workflow faster and more reliable. More detailed documentation will also follow.
134292.tagline: Rename & export $IMG layers via tags. Template & docs coming soon for easy setup.

Perfect for designers who want sleek, minimal, futuristic interfaces — fast.

plugins.name: CopySpark - AI Copywriter
plugins.description:
CopySpark – is an AI-powered Figma plugin built for designers. Powered by ChatGPT and Gemini, it helps you write clear, effective UX copy without leaving your canvas.


✨ Easily write new content from scratch.

🔁 Instantly generate alternative versions.

⚡ Work faster with AI instructions tailored to your tone and context.


Say goodbye to blank text boxes — let AI help you craft and iterate copy in seconds!


How to Use

  1. Choose your AI model – ChatGPT or Gemini.
  2. Enter your API key for the selected model.
  3. Select a text layer in your Figma file.
  4. Choose whether to generate alternatives for the selected text or write new copy from a prompt.
  5. Click “Go” to generate options, then click the version you like to insert it into your text layer.


Get Gemini API Key

Get ChatGPT API Key
plugins.tagline: AI copywriting powered by ChatGPT & Gemini! Write and iterate with ease!

plugins.name: DeepL Translator
plugins.description:
DeepL Translator


A Figma plugin that quickly translates text within frames using the DeepL API.

The acceleration feature enables faster translations and cost savings.


Features


  1. 🚀 Fast Translation: Re-use past translation history for fast fast translation
  2. 💰️ Cost Saving: Save API Usage by Re-use past translation history
  3. 🌐 Multi-language Support: Supports 29 languages
  4. 📚 Glossary Support: Use DeepL glossaries for consistent translations
  5. 🌍 Auto Detection: Automatic source language detection
  6. 📝 Non-destructive: Creates new frames for translations while preserving originals
  7. 🎯 Simple Operation: Just select languages and click translate


How to Use


  1. Get a DeepL API key (see below)
  2. Select a frame containing text to translate
  3. Choose source and target languages
  4. (Optional) Select a glossary
  5. Click "Translate"
  6. Translation results appear in a new frame


Getting a DeepL API Key


1. Sign up for a DeepL account at DeepL Pro

  1. Free plan available (500,000 characters/month)
  2. Pro plan available for more usage

2. Get your API key:

  1. Log in to your DeepL account
  2. Go to "Account" → "API keys"
  3. Copy your API key

3. Enter your API key in the plugin settings


Supported Languages


See the complete list of supported languages for details.


Major languages include:


  1. English (EN)
  2. Chinese (ZH)
  3. Korean (KO)
  4. German (DE)
  5. French (FR)
  6. Spanish (ES)
  7. Italian (IT)
  8. Dutch (NL)
  9. Japanese (JA)
  10. Portuguese (PT)
  11. Russian (RU)


And 18 more languages


Notes


  1. DeepL API key required (available with free plan)
  2. Free plan includes 500,000 characters per month
  3. Source language must be specified when using glossaries
  4. API keys are securely encrypted and stored


Support & Feedback


We welcome your feedback! Please contact to developer through:


- Contact Form for:

  1. Questions & Inquiries
  2. Feature Requests
  3. Bug Reports
  4. General Feedback


Privacy

  1. DeepL API keys are securely encrypted
  2. Translation data is processed on DeepL servers and not stored
plugins.tagline: Translate texts in Figma by DeepL

plugins.name: Design Roaster
plugins.description:
Design Analyzer & Enhancer is your intelligent Figma assistant, designed to help you elevate your designs to the next level. With a single click, this plugin scans your entire Figma file, analyses your current design, and delivers a comprehensive review—including pros, cons, and actionable recommendations for improvement.

But that’s not all: inspired by your existing work, Design Analyzer & Enhancer also proposes an enhanced design concept, offering you a creative starting point for your next iteration. Whether you’re seeking a quick design audit or looking for fresh inspiration, this plugin empowers designers of all levels to create more polished, user-friendly, and visually compelling interfaces.

Key Features

• Automated Design Analysis: Instantly review your design’s strengths and areas for improvement.

• Actionable Recommendations: Get practical tips and suggestions tailored to your specific design.

• Proposed Enhanced Designs: Explore new design directions generated based on your current work.

• Easy to Use: One-click operation, no complex setup required.

• Boost Your Creativity: Use AI-powered insights to inspire your next great design.

• Transform your workflow, catch overlooked issues, and get inspired—all without leaving Figma.
plugins.tagline: Designer's companion for better UX/UI by ABA Bank

plugins.name: Color Explorer
plugins.description:
🎨 What is Color Explorer?

Color Explorer is a smart Figma plugin designed to help designers, early-stage founders, agencies, strategists, DTC operators, and marketers quickly find the perfect color palettes for their brand.


With over 3,000+ curated palettes (increasing everyday), you can preview and apply full-brand color systems to any selected frame or layer—in one click.


🚀 Key Features

  2. 3000+ Color Palettes: Handpicked and categorized palettes to match different brand moods and industries
  3. One-Click Apply: Instantly replace all fill/stroke/text colors in your selection
  4. Lightweight and Fast: Designed for speed and real-time creative flow


🔧 Use Cases

  1. Explore visual directions before committing to a brand look
  2. Save time in early-stage design sprints
  3. Quickly swap palettes in Figma without manual editing
  4. Present polished options to clients and stakeholders


💸 One-Time Purchase

plugins.name: Remote Variable Replacer
plugins.description:
Sometimes Figma variables aren’t coming from inside the house. While this plugin has a likely very tiny amount of potential users, if I can help anybody save any time trying to locate and replace variables that are orphans or “remote”, then this has been worth it.


For whatever reason, variables in Figma can be attached to other libraries, older files, archived files even. This can cause major headaches when editing local variables and components don’t seem to respond to the edits.


I fully expect this plugin to have a limited lifespan as Figma themselves will likely improve variable handling during copy/pastes, schema renaming or other scenarios where variables can be orphaned.


In the meantime, I got you.
plugins.tagline: Replace those pesky remote variables!

135284.name: Remote Variable Replacer
135284.description:
Sometimes Figma variables aren’t coming from inside the house. While this plugin has a likely very tiny amount of potential users, if I can help anybody save any time trying to locate and replace variables that are orphans or “remote”, then this has been worth it.


For whatever reason, variables in Figma can be attached to other libraries, older files, archived files even. This can cause major headaches when editing local variables and components don’t seem to respond to the edits.


I fully expect this plugin to have a limited lifespan as Figma themselves will likely improve variable handling during copy/pastes, schema renaming or other scenarios where variables can be orphaned.


In the meantime, I got you.
135284.release_notes:
Improved the dropdowns for numerical variables to only show local variables whose base value match the remote variable base value. This should make the plugin easy to navigate if a user has hundreds of variables.

Removed beta language; Included network access for tailwind for easy stying and unpkg.com for React. This should fix the blank screen of death. Rookie mistake!

Also updated the data security details to let users know the network access is only for static items.

plugins.name: ぼかし背景ジェネレーター
plugins.description:
# Image Aspect Ratio & Background Blur Generator Plugin


## Overview


This Figma plugin automatically generates a new frame from selected images (or rectangles with image fills),

with a **specified aspect ratio and width, and a blurred background**.


- Useful for creating SNS thumbnails and other aspect-ratio-fixed images

- Supports batch processing of multiple images at once


---


## Main Features


- **Aspect Ratio & Width Customization**

Choose from custom ratios or presets (16:9, 4:3, 1:1, etc.). You can freely specify the width (px).


- **Background Blur Effect**

The original image is enlarged and blurred as the background, with the original image centered. Blur strength and scale are adjustable.


- **Batch Processing**

Select multiple images or rectangles with image fills and generate all at once.


- **Automatic Saving & Restoration of Settings**

Your last-used settings are saved in Figma's clientStorage and automatically restored on next launch.


- **Japanese UI**

Intuitive and easy-to-use Japanese interface.


---


## How to Use


1. **Select images or rectangles with image fills**

Multiple selection is supported.


2. **Launch the plugin**

Set the aspect ratio, width, blur strength, and scale in the UI.


3. **Click the "Create" button**

A new frame with the specified ratio, width, and blurred background will be generated to the right of the selected image(s).


4. **Notification**

Success and error messages are shown at the bottom of the UI with color distinction.


---


## Notes


- Non-image nodes are automatically skipped.

- Settings are saved per Figma file.


---


## Data Security


- This plugin does **not** send any user data, images, or personal information to external servers.

- All settings are stored locally using Figma's `clientStorage` API.

- No external API or server communication is performed.


---


# 背景ブラー＆アスペクト比固定の画像生成プラグイン


## 概要


この Figma プラグインは、選択した画像（または画像 fill を持つ矩形）から、

**指定したアスペクト比・幅で新しいフレームを作成し、背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成**します。


- SNS 用サムネイルやサムネイル画像の自動生成に便利です

- 複数画像を一括で処理できます


---


## 主な機能


- **アスペクト比・幅の指定**

カスタム比率やプリセット（16:9, 4:3, 1:1 など）から選択可能。幅（px）も自由に指定できます。


- **背景ブラー効果**

元画像を拡大・ぼかして背景にし、中央に元画像を配置します。ブラー強度や拡大率も調整可能。


- **複数画像の一括処理**

複数の画像や画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択して一括で生成できます。


- **前回の設定値を自動保存・復元**

設定値は Figma の clientStorage に保存され、次回起動時に自動で復元されます。


- **日本語 UI**

直感的で使いやすい日本語インターフェース。


---


## 使い方


1. **画像または画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択**

複数選択も可能です。


2. **プラグインを起動**

UI でアスペクト比・幅・ブラー強度・拡大率を設定します。


3. **「作成」ボタンをクリック**

選択画像の右隣に、指定した比率・幅・ブラー背景付きの新しいフレームが自動生成されます。


4. **通知**

成功・エラーは画面下部に色分けして表示されます。


---


## 注意点


- 画像以外のノードは自動的にスキップされます。

- 設定値は Figma ファイルごとに保存されます。


---


## データセキュリティ


- 本プラグインはユーザーのデータや画像、個人情報を外部サーバーに一切送信しません。

- 設定値はFigmaの`clientStorage`機能を用いてローカル環境のみに保存されます。

- 外部APIや外部サーバーとの通信は一切行いません。
plugins.tagline: 選択した画像から、指定したアスペクト比・幅で背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成します。

plugins.name: SuperLayer (copy)
plugins.description:
SuperLayer (copy) lets you quickly view and copy the names of selected layers in your Figma file or FigJam board. It’s ideal for generating UI inventories, documentation, or simply organizing your layer structure. The plugin also shows each layer’s type and a thumbnail preview when available.


To use it, select one or more layers on your canvas and launch the plugin. A clean list view will appear with sorting options and checkboxes to include or exclude layers. Click the Copy button to copy all selected layer names to your clipboard, formatted line by line. The list updates automatically as you change your selection.


SuperLayer is optimized for speed and simplicity. It does not currently support exporting full metadata, nested hierarchy structures, or annotations. Thumbnails are generated when possible, but may not appear for certain FigJam elements or complex Figma nodes.
plugins.tagline: Copy Figma and FigJam layer names with ease. Sortable and perfect for docs, audits, and checklists

131488.name: SuperLayer (copy)
131488.description:
SuperLayer (copy) lets you quickly view and copy the names of selected layers in your Figma file or FigJam board. It’s ideal for generating UI inventories, documentation, or simply organizing your layer structure. The plugin also shows each layer’s type and a thumbnail preview when available.


To use it, select one or more layers on your canvas and launch the plugin. A clean list view will appear with sorting options and checkboxes to include or exclude layers. Click the Copy button to copy all selected layer names to your clipboard, formatted line by line. The list updates automatically as you change your selection.


SuperLayer is optimized for speed and simplicity. It does not currently support exporting full metadata, nested hierarchy structures, or annotations. Thumbnails are generated when possible, but may not appear for certain FigJam elements or complex Figma nodes.

plugins.name: View Jumper
plugins.description: View Jumper helps designers quickly navigate large Figma files by creating visual bookmarks. Users set two key locations (View A and View B) that they need to reference frequently, then instantly teleport between them with preserved zoom levels and page context. Whether using the UI buttons, menu commands, or keyboard shortcuts, this plugin eliminates the frustration of constantly scrolling and searching through complex designs, making workflow significantly more efficient when comparing or referencing different areas.

accepted.name: Christopher
accepted.description:
Product Design @ heyo.is
Brand Design @ MARKoftheBRAND.com

plugins.tagline: Set viewpoints A & B. Teleport between design locations with a click.

plugins.name: Section Logger
plugins.description: ¡No pierdas ni un cambio! Con Section Logger, cada modificación en tus secciones de Figma queda registrada automáticamente. Visualiza los cambios en tiempo real, guarda un historial detallado de tus ediciones y personaliza el diseño con colores que se ajustan a tu estilo. Ideal para equipos que buscan organización, colaboración y eficiencia. ¡Mejora tu flujo de trabajo ahora!
plugins.tagline: Transforma tu flujo de trabajo: registra, organiza y visualiza cambios de diseño veloz.

129666.name: Section Logger
129666.description: ¡No pierdas ni un cambio! Con Section Logger, cada modificación en tus secciones de Figma queda registrada automáticamente. Visualiza los cambios en tiempo real, guarda un historial detallado de tus ediciones y personaliza el diseño con colores que se ajustan a tu estilo. Ideal para equipos que buscan organización, colaboración y eficiencia. ¡Mejora tu flujo de trabajo ahora!
129666.release_notes:
Release Note: Versión 1.1

Nuevas funcionalidades:
1.Soporte de idioma (Español/Inglés):
•Se ha implementado un selector de idioma en la UI del plugin, que permite cambiar entre español e inglés con un switch/slider intuitivo.
•El idioma de la interfaz (títulos, botones y textos) cambia dinámicamente según la selección del usuario.
•El texto de los logs registrados también cambia de idioma, mostrando la información correctamente tanto en español como en inglés, dependiendo del idioma seleccionado.
2.Actualización de sticker:
•Mejora de la gestión de stickers: Ahora, si un sticker ya existe, se actualiza con los nuevos logs en lugar de crear uno nuevo cada vez que se registra una edición.
•Si el sticker ya está presente, su contenido se limpia y se reemplaza con los nuevos logs, garantizando que no haya stickers duplicados.

Mejoras adicionales:
•Se mejoró el posicionamiento dinámico del sticker, asegurando que se mantenga correctamente ubicado en la esquina superior izquierda de la sección.
•Se optimizó el código para hacer el plugin más eficiente y evitar la creación de stickers innecesarios.

Fixes:
•Se solucionó un problema en el que un nuevo sticker se creaba cada vez que se registraba un log, incluso si ya existía uno previamente.
129666.tagline: Transforma tu flujo de trabajo: registra, organiza y visualiza cambios de diseño veloz.

plugins.name: ColourSwatch
plugins.description:
Enhance your Figma workflow with the ColourSwatch plugin


Streamline the creation, management, and updating of colour swatches using local or published Figma colour variables. This plugin provides a clear visual overview of all the colours in your project, ensuring consistency and efficiency.


With this plugin, you can easily create a ColourSwatch component. For each colour variable —whether from a local collection or a linked, published Figma library — you can generate a component instance. Use the plugin to effortlessly update values such as hex codes, alpha values, and colour variable names — one by one or as a batch for all colour swatches on the same page.
plugins.tagline: Create maintain and update colour swatches based on your Figma colour variables.

plugins.name: Heavy Page Organizer
plugins.description:
Heavy Frame Organizer is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly organize components and sections on your canvas. With customizable spacing options, the plugin automatically arranges your main component at the top left, and positions related sub-components vertically below it. Sections are moved to the right of the main component, with spacing between each element based on user-defined settings. This tool helps streamline the organization of complex design files and improves your workflow efficiency.


Important:

The plugin only works while listening to Meshuggah
plugins.tagline: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing pages.

127297.name: Heavy Page Organizer
127297.description:
Heavy Frame Organizer is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly organize components and sections on your canvas. With customizable spacing options, the plugin automatically arranges your main component at the top left, and positions related sub-components vertically below it. Sections are moved to the right of the main component, with spacing between each element based on user-defined settings. This tool helps streamline the organization of complex design files and improves your workflow efficiency.


Important:

The plugin only works while listening to Meshuggah
127297.release_notes:
New Features:
➕ Multi-column layout support: You can now organize multiple main components into their own columns.
📎 Sub-component alignment: Sub-components that begin with .[Main Component Name] are automatically grouped and aligned beneath their respective main components.
📄 Section column: Sections are now placed in their own vertical column to the far right.

UX Improvements:
🎯 Autofocus on first input for faster, smoother use.
⌨️ Return key support – press Enter to trigger the “Apply” action without needing to click.
127297.tagline: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing pages.

plugins.name: QD - Revix - AI Feedback
plugins.description:
Get AI-Powered UI/UX Feedback Instantly! 🚀


Struggling to spot design issues? Let AI do the work! This powerful plugin analyzes your designs, provides insightful UI/UX feedback, and instantly adds comments, helping you refine your work faster and smarter.


✨ How it works:

✅ Select a design frame and start the analysis.

✅ Get multiple AI-generated feedback suggestions.

✅ Instantly add feedback as comments on your design.


Save time, improve usability, and design with confidence. all with the power of AI! 🦾🤖
plugins.tagline: AI feedback and comments on designs

plugins.name: Unit
plugins.description: Unit is a lightweight tool that helps designers and developers extract CSS friendly measurements directly from Figma. No more manual conversions, just copy and paste values into your code.
